title: A sermon upon the resurrection preached before the Right Honourable Sir Edward Clark, Lord-Mayor, the Aldermen, and Governors of the several hospitals of the city, at St. Bridget's Church, on Easter-Monday, April 5, 1697 : being one of the anniversary spittal-sermons / by John Lord Bishop of Chichester.
author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
publisher: Printed for Ri. Chiswell, and Tho. Cockerill ...,
